ThingDef.label: Devaronian edge
ThingDef.description: Devaronian Blood-poison is a gemstone that can release poison into a victim's bloodstream. Application of Devaronian particles on a blade's edge can cause great pain to the weapon's victim. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: Neutronium edge
ThingDef.description: Neutronium is a highly durable and resilient material used in the creation of durasteel. It can be used to increase the damage inflicted by a blade. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: Mullinine edge
ThingDef.description: Mullinine is an ideal building material for melee weapons as it holds an edge very well. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: Quadranium edge
ThingDef.description: Quadranium is an amazingly strong material that is sometimes used for fuel storage containers. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: ion cell
ThingDef.description: Ion cells discharge ions along the length of the blade. Only certain melee weapons, like vibroblades, can utilize energy cells. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: enhanced vibration cell
ThingDef.description: Vibration energy cells increase the amount of damage a weapon can inflict, but make them much harder to wield. Only certain melee weapons, like vibroblades, can utilize energy cells. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: enhanced energy cell
ThingDef.description: Enhanced energy cells can stabilize the blade, increasing damage. Only certain melee weapons, like vibroblades, can utilize energy cells. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: sonic discharge cell
ThingDef.description: Sonic discharge energy cells release sound waves upon impact. Though the sonic discharge makes the weapon unwieldy, few types of armor protect against this type of attack. Only certain melee weapons, like vibroblades, can utilize energy cells. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: contoured grip
ThingDef.description: This shorter grip allows maximum accuracy, but the reduced leverage limits the weapon's power. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: Agrinium grip
ThingDef.description: This grip, made from the lighter mineral agrinium, balances a weapon towards the point, resulting in heftier swings. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: basket hilt
ThingDef.description: The basket hilt makes a weapon ideal for parrying, but slightly less wieldy. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: Nagai grip
ThingDef.description: The Nagai designed this grip to improve a weapon's performance without any side-effects. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.

ThingDef.label: Zabrak grip
ThingDef.description: This specialized grip has a reduced crossguard, increasing both accuracy and damage, but making it less useful for parrying. Use of this weapon modification requires a gunsmith or Aratech workbench, and an upgradeable weapon.
